name: Maniacs (Ravi) (Ravi)
description: Maniacs is a Zombie – Survival Game. This game was designed for giving people the thrill of surviving in a post-apocalyptic world. The story of this game is that there was an almost a mentally Ill billionaire who took over the island where our protagonist lives and starts experimenting on The people to create bio-weapons as bio warfare is coming up big time.  And due to these experiments, he tortures, mutilates, and kills so many people, in the end creating zombies. Now, you might think that he succeeded in creating a bio-weapon but technically not as these zombies could not be controlled which is why our protagonist got out safely and is still human. But, after seeing all this the protagonist which is you the player takes killing all the zombies and the billionaire into his hands.
